abilities.name: Reactive Lift
abilities.effect: As long as Wailord has any React Energy cards attached to it, the Retreat Cost for each of your Water Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) is 0.

attacks.name: Hypno Splash
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Rely on Friends
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Stage 1 Evolved Pokémon.
